name: MansionAdventures
description:
This is an adventure game that takes place in haunted? mansion. You are a burglar who is escaping from the police and you decided to hide in the mansion. Once entered you notice that you can not get back outside until the air is clear.

You start wondering around the building encountering various situations and meet interesting people in your way.

What happens in the end is unknown.

WIP.

Made in Unity3D

Game by

Andrew Odwald

Danio Wesolowski

Gabriel Potamianos

Keron Sepp



Very early phase.
